jobTitle: Data Engineer / Data Architect / Data analyst
jobDescription: Data EngineerLocation: Houston TXLong Term Contract Who are we looking for? 5 to 8 years of experience in SQL, Meta Data management.The ideal candidate will have years of technical expertise related to Database Administration, Data Governance and Master Data Management.Data Management expertise with SQL is must and the ideal candidate will help with the Master Data Management (SQL Server or Oracle).Technical Skills:SQL CoreStrong understanding of databases and data structures.Strong analytical and time management skills.Need to help in schema reviews, naming standards, PII/GDPR classification.Technical expertise in rolling out Meta Data Management and Data Governance aspects.Intermediate facilitation skills with the ability to drive issues to closure.Self-motivated and able to handle tasks with minimal supervision or questions.Ability to deliver a high level of customer service.Ability to write various documents such as functional requirements specifically in PII / GDPR Compliance.Ability to compare technologies and make recommendations to senior members of the team.Understanding of privacy laws and regulations.Excellent level proficiency in Structured Query Language (SQL).Intermediate level proficiency with VBA.Foster company success through a professional appearance, being courteous to customers with positive attitude.Mahesh Marlapati Email: Maheshm@Datawavetechnologies.comPhone: 973-695-1089  Fax : 973 577 8815Data Wave Technologies Parsippany NJ 07054www.datawavetechnologies.com - provided by Dice  SQL,Data Management,Meta data,Data Governance,Data
